entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Compat] Add rule to make sure virtual modifier is not removed #18682
    7.0.1xx

Updated

  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure parameter names don't change #23908
  • Turn PackageValidation on by default #23910
  • clarify API Compatibility rules for virtual keyword #26169
  • Breaking change in response file parsing #26026
  • [API Compat] Add rule to prohibit making a member virtual #18683
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet-sdk installed with snap crashes on Ubuntu 21.04 #18249

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a typo #26244
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Nagilson pr2linux #26242
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26235
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/CompilationContext/TestApp #26164
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/KitchenSink/TestLibrary #26162
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26218
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Allow Opt-In to change the default to Release for Pack/Pub #25991
    Area-NetSDK
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/SimpleDependencies #26165
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
